messages.title: Who will REALLY fight your corner?
The choice at the next election is a simple one:
messages.content: Boris Johnson's failing Tories OR Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats

messages.title: Help Take Welwyn Hatfield Forward
messages.content: Person by person, we are growing an energetic grassroots movement that will deliver real change for people in every corner of Welwyn Hatfield. We are working hard to build a fairer, greener, safer, and more caring future for us all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working relentlessly to stop Brexit and keep Britain open, progressive and prosperous.
Pushing for bold action to tackle the climate emergency head on and protect our environment.
Fight to put more money into our schools and hospitals, providing the funding they need.
Liberal Democrats are leading the climate change agenda.
We have already initiated three trials to create wild flower verge zones around Welwyn Hatfield and we promise to continue to create a healthier ecosystem.
Welwyn Hatfield Borough Council must champion our young people.

issues.brexitEurope: Working relentlessly to stop Brexit and keep Britain open, progressive and prosperous.
issues.education: Fight to put more money into our schools, providing the funding they need.
issues.environment: Pushing for bold action to tackle the climate emergency head on and protect our environment.
issues.health: Fight to put more money into our hospitals, providing the funding they need.

community.content: Improving our ecosystem: We have already initiated three trials to create wild flower verge zones around Welwyn Hatfield and we promise to continue to create a healthier ecosystem by installing more.

Supporting young people: Welwyn Hatfield Borough Council must champion our young people. There is widespread recognition that young people often struggle to keep a roof over their heads, they face high rents and family budgets are being stretched further and further.

contactInformation.address: LIBERAL DEMOCRATS C/O BARBARA GIBSON, MEP UNIT 2 REGUS, FALCON GATE SHIRE PARK, AL7 1TW

examples: More and more people are backing Paul Zukowskyj here

personalStories.story: As the strongest remain party, the Liberal Democrats can unseat the Conservatives here in Welwyn Hatfield; we can win.
